label: TransportationWasteRecoveryDisposalProcess
comment: A process of either regaining substances in usable form, or of getting rid of substances resulting from transportation.

objectProperties.comment: A textual description for the type of transportation waste recovery disposal process.
A process certificate specified for this transportation waste recovery disposal process.
The code specifying the type of transportation waste recovery disposal process.

referencedBy.comment: A transportation waste recovery disposal process applicable to this transportation waste material.
